item.title: SingularityNET and Star Atlas partner to combine Web3 games and AI Agents
item.description: SingularityNET, a founding member of the ASI Alliance, has partnered with ATMTA, maker of Star Atlas, the Web3 space exploration online game.

item.title: Rapt AI and AMD work to make GPU utilization more efficient
item.description: Rapt AI, a provider of AI-powered AI-workload automation for GPUs and AI accelerators, has teamed with AMD to enhance AI infrastructure.
